article_title: Scott Hill hired as permanent top executive at Columbus Regional
article_text: Columbus Regional Health on Thursday said it has hired Scott Hill, its interim chief executive officer since Charles "Chuck" Stark's resignation in June, to operate the health-care and hospital system permanently. He becomes president and CEO.

article_metadata.news-keywords: columbus regional health, scott hill, hospital ceo

article_summary:
Columbus Regional Health on Thursday said it has hired Scott Hill, its interim chief executive officer since Charles "Chuck" Stark's resignation in June, to operate the health-care and hospital system permanently.
He becomes president and CEO.
